summary: A pool shark takes the ultimate gamble when she kidnaps her own son and flees her ex-husband.
cast: Famke Janssen|Jaymie Dornan|Rip Torn|Matt Ross|Lois Smith|Marin Hinkle|Terry Kinney|John Juback|Tony Robles|Jordan Bridges|Ari Graynor|Santo D'Asaro|Zoe Lister-Jones|Elizabeth Atkeson|Joseph Siravo|Brennan Brown|Jordan Lage|Pete Macnamara|Henry Leyva|Greg Haas|Paul Thode|Judith Greentree|David Calicchio|Chris Eigeman|Vincenzo Vaccaro|James Avondolio|Kevin Barber|Tom Carney|Rebecca Silbery-Tatafu|Bill Sorice
title: Turn the River
